summary: During World War I, a teenage girl begins a romance with a college student, but his unconventional attitudes cause friction with her father.
cast: Doris Day|Gordon MacRae|Jack Smith|Leon Ames|Rosemary DeCamp|Mary Wickes|Ellen Corby|Billy Gray|Henry East|Jeffrey Stevens|Eddie Marr|Sig Arno|Lois Austin|Chet Brandenburg|Joe Brooks|Morgan Brown|Tony Butala|Esther Dale|Roy Damron|Bert Davidson|James Dobson|George Ford|Robert Haines|Creighton Hale|Sherry Hall|John Hedloe|George Hoagland|Chester Jones|Gayle Kellogg|Fred Kelsey|Anne Kimbell|Perk Lazelle|Melodi Lowell|Hank Mann|Max|Philo McCullough|Michael Miller|Ralph Montgomery|Anne Moore|Roland Morris|Jack Mower|Richard Neill|Joel Nestler|Edmund Penney|Joe Recht|Suzanne Ridgway|Ray Spiker|Susan Whitney|John B. Williams|Buck Woods
title: A la luz de la luna
